name: 普兰诺·贝莉-邦德
awards: 2021年 第24届英国独立电影奖 最佳新人导演 (提名) 电影审查员
2021年 第24届英国独立电影奖 最佳新人编剧 (提名) 电影审查员
name_full: 普兰诺·贝莉-邦德 Prano Bailey-Bond

last_movies.title: Things We Lost in the Fire

introduction: Prano Bailey-Bond is a director and writer originally from Wales. She was named a 2021 'Director to Watch' by Variety and a Screen International 'Star of Tomorrow' in 2018. Prano's debut feature film, CENSOR, starring Niamh Algar and supported by the BFI, Film4 and Ffilm Cymru Wales, opened the Midnight section of the 2021 Sundance Film Festival and went on to be selected for the Berlin Film Festival's Panorama section.
